text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Somehow a Texas grocery store worked with Chinese counterparts to evaluate the Coronavirus, make predictions, and prepare well.  You and the government-run agencies could not do the same. Just shutting down travel was not enough. You don’t get a pass.
